metadata.title: CVE-2017-11343 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-6125, all versions of CHICKEN Schemeup to and including 4.12.0 are vulnerable to an algorithmic complexityattack. An attacker can provide crafted input which, when inserted into thesymbol table, will result in O(n) lookup time.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11343` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.12.0-0.3
libchicken11 - 4.12.0-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chicken package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.12.0-0.3').
